summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 2, Law's Addition and block 16, Capitol Hill Addition No. 2, being the alley between 16th Avenue North and 17th Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Mercer Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 115898 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
